sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{fontFile.MainMenu}}
</template>

<script>
import bus from '../../util/Bus'
export default {
  name: "Main_menu",
  data(){
    return{
      fontFile:require('@/json/en-US_font.json')
    }
  },
  created() {
    console.log('4')
  },
  mounted() {
    // eslint-disable-next-line no-constant-condition
    this.acceptFontFile()
    console.log('menu-mounted')
  },
  methods:{
    /*
    * 获取页面FontFild
    * */
    acceptFontFile(){
      console.log("ok")
      bus.on("getFontFile",(val)=>{
        console.log("yes",val)
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
@import "../../less/main";

</style>
